title: Skins
body:
Dear RIOT games,
As a frequent player of League of Legends over the past few years, I have noticed your need to create skins for champions that do not need them, champions that currently receive a lot of play time are receiving meaningless cosmetic replacements which in some cases provide minimal advantages that make an already strong champion stronger.
RIOT games I ask you this, as more of a plea from a player of a forgotten champion, please grant us the gloriousness of a new shiny Star Guardian skin for my boi Urgot!!!!

Sincerely
Pandola #StarGuardianUrgot2K17

replies.body: dude haha urgot jokes are HILARIOUS glad you made this post

Skins don't provide advantages to champs though, and when they actually do due to bad design, it's usually fixed rather quick.

Urgot won't be receiving skins any time soon though, because he's currently in the process of being reworked which I think is actually coming up rather soon, so before that happens, he won't be receiving any skins unfortunately. Not to mention, Riot isn't exactly too keen in giving him and a couple other champs skins in the first place; see Yorick, still no new skin after rework.
